title: Create a public landing page for CHILDSHIELD OUTREACH FOUNDATION

requirements.text: Create a public, single-page website (landing page) for the charity named “CHILDSHIELD OUTREACH FOUNDATION”, accessible at the app’s root URL (/), with clear on-page sections and navigation.

quotes: Create a website link for a charity called CHILDSHIELD OUTREACH FOUNDATION

acceptanceCriteria: Visiting the deployed app root path (/) displays a landing page titled “CHILDSHIELD OUTREACH FOUNDATION”.
The page includes a top navigation (or equivalent) that scrolls to sections on the same page.
At minimum, the page contains these sections: Hero (name + short tagline), About, What We Do/Programs, Get Involved/Support, Contact.
All user-facing text is in English.

requirements.text: Apply a coherent, distinctive visual theme appropriate for a child-focused charity (consistent colors, typography, spacing, and component styling) across the landing page.

quotes: Create a website link for a charity called CHILDSHIELD OUTREACH FOUNDATION

acceptanceCriteria: A consistent theme is used across headings, body text, buttons/links, section backgrounds, and spacing.
Theme avoids a default/unstyled look and is applied consistently across all sections.
Theme does not rely on blue-and-purple as the primary palette.

requirements.text: Add basic SEO and share metadata for the landing page (document title and meta description) reflecting “CHILDSHIELD OUTREACH FOUNDATION”.

quotes: Create a website link for a charity called CHILDSHIELD OUTREACH FOUNDATION

acceptanceCriteria: Browser tab title is set to “CHILDSHIELD OUTREACH FOUNDATION”.
A meta description is present and describes the charity in general terms without adding unverifiable specifics.

requirements.text: Include generated static image assets (logo and hero/banner illustration) and render them on the landing page using static hosting (not served via the backend).

quotes: Create a website link for a charity called CHILDSHIELD OUTREACH FOUNDATION

acceptanceCriteria: Generated images are stored under frontend/public/assets/generated.
The logo appears in the header/hero area, and the hero/banner image appears in the hero section.
No backend endpoints are introduced solely to serve these images.

constraints: Use English for all user-facing text.

Do not modify files in frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, or anything under frontend/src/components/ui (compose/consume them instead).
Backend must remain a single Motoko actor; add backend logic only if strictly necessary for the landing page.
nonGoals: User accounts/authentication changes beyond the template defaults
Integration with third-party social media APIs
Collecting/storing contact form submissions on-chain (unless explicitly requested later)

required: Charity logo mark with the text “CHILDSHIELD OUTREACH FOUNDATION”, clean vector-like style, transparent background (childshield-logo.dim_512x512.png)
Warm, hopeful hero banner illustration suitable for a child protection charity, no text, wide layout (childshield-hero.dim_1600x600.png)
